text: Raal kamator ngaikha inmani itho angnga puondiar kabang inthosik eii, halli kei'n inmani raming ngaikha ringna larik makheiya khainuning. Kapa khat-um ama marwaan tirton ngai maikuungnga kei'n inmani ngaihi kei kami in-eii tikata kamalarsik eii.” Suok 32:32,33; Minpkla 69:28; Chonglar 20:12; Matt 10:32; Luk 12:8
